name: Spawn of Arbeyach
movement: walks at a slow speed of 20 feet
description: The Spawn of Arbeyach is a Medium fiend with natural armor and a formidable appearance characterized by its fiendish traits, possessing strong physical attributes.
memorable: Its ability to summon swarms of insects and incapacitate foes with poison makes it uniquely dangerous.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its opponents and manipulate the battlefield to its advantage.
relations: May be encountered alongside other fiends or insect swarms as allies.
environment: Often found in infernal realms or dark, cursed locations.
strengths: Highly resistant to fire and poison, with magic resistance from spells and magical effects.
weaknesses: Relatively low movement speed limits its mobility in combat.
attacks: Utilizes a bite attack for piercing damage enhanced with poison and a stinger attack that also delivers lethal poison effects.
most_powerful_ability: Children of Arbeyach allows it to call upon swarms of insects for assistance in battle.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, enhancing its ability to detect threats even in obscured areas.
skills: Skilled in Perception and Stealth, providing it advantages in noticing hidden dangers and sneaking.
additional_information: Immunities to fire damage and poisoned condition.
Advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks when near hive members.
Can communicate with insects, offering strategic possibilities.
Magic resistance grants it resilience against spells.
Can inflict poison status on its enemies, requiring saves to escape the effect.
test_queries: fiend that commands swarms of insects
lawful evil creature using hive tactics
medium fiend with bite and stinger attacks
creature resistant to fire and magic
